name: Escape the Earth
description:
Made On the 2016th Puerto Rico Game Jam, by Team Widdle Biscuit (SolAZDev, MaAlGon3, Mr-Canvas). With themes Creepy Fruit and Nature.

Escape the Earth is a 2D platformer runner where Nature has taken over the earth to the point where fruits can communicate over roots. A robot who's only name is it's session user "Dashbot" has awoken in the depths of a cave, left with no connectivity nor knowledge of who he is or where he is.

Mother Nature has set it that Technology will not oppose Nature, and thus will attack it. Little Dashbot will have to find it's way out of the cave and to find what might remain.

Inspired by Cave Story and N+

PS: 3D Version unknown (Experimental)
